body: Humans from bustling cities are skilled with crowds. They gain a +1 bonus on Reflex saves and a +1 dodge bonus to Armor Class when adjacent to at least two other allies. Crowds do not count as difficult terrain for them. This racial trait replaces the skilled racial trait.
name: Heart of the Streets
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Races/Humans/Alternate Racial Traits/Heart of the Streets
